data.lyric:
[ti:Pray For Me (Clean)]
[ar:The Weeknd/Kendrick Lamar]
[al:Pray For Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Pray For Me (Clean) - The Weeknd/Kendrick Lamar (肯德里克·拉马尔)
[00:05.19]Written by：Kendrick Duckworth/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/A. Feeney/M. McKinney
[00:10.39]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:11.86]
[00:14.62]I'm always ready for a war again
[00:17.53]
[00:18.73]Go down that road again
[00:19.98]
[00:21.07]It's all the same
[00:22.06]
[00:23.98]I'm always ready to take a life again
[00:27.10]
[00:28.20]You know I'll ride again
[00:29.51]
[00:30.56]It's all the same
[00:31.64]Ooh ooh ooh
[00:33.03]Tell me who's gon' save me from myself
[00:37.00]
[00:37.73]When this life is all I know
[00:41.44]
[00:42.60]Tell me who's gon' save me from this hell
[00:46.56]
[00:47.32]Without you I'm all alone
[00:51.27]
[00:52.20]Who gon' pray for me
[00:53.53]

[00:55.71]

[01:02.88]

[01:05.23]

[01:11.35]

[01:14.42]I fight God just tell me how many burdens left
[01:16.75]I fight pain and hurricanes today I wept
[01:19.17]I'm tryna fight back tears flood on my doorsteps
[01:21.21]
[01:21.77]Life a livin' hell puddles of blood in the streets
[01:24.07]Shooters on top of the building government aiding relief
[01:26.46]Earthquake the body drop the ground breaks
[01:28.75]The poor one with smoke lungs and Scarface
[01:31.14]Who need a hero
[01:32.20]Hero
[01:32.86]You need a hero look in the mirror there go your hero
[01:35.05]Who on the front lines at Ground Zero
[01:36.97]Hero
[01:37.47]My heart don't skip a beat even when hard times bumps the needle
[01:40.32]Mass destruction and mass corruption
[01:42.12]Their souls are sufferin' men
[01:43.51]Clutchin' on deaf ears again rapture is comin'
[01:45.80]It's all prophecy
[01:46.80]And if I gotta be sacrificed for the greater good
[01:49.04]Then that's what it gotta be
[01:49.89]Who gon' pray for me
[01:50.77]

[01:53.03]
